channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Serous pothole an road broken up around drain gulley, 8th February
item.description:
The Road has broken up around pretty much all the drain gulley covers along Oakfield lane, between the roundabouts, but the first one Eastbound is the worst, Further along oakfield, by the pedestrian crossing Westbound is also VERY bad.. It's a busy road and it's hard for cyclists to move around the covers., but they're really dangerous if you clip one, and it'll have you off in a heartbreat
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road broken up around drain gulley covers, 8th February
item.description:
The Road has broken up around pretty much all the drain gulley covers along Parkhill Road, Eastbound, I think from the busses. Cars park on the westbound side of the road meaning the problem is only on the eastbound. It's a busy road and it's hard for cyclists to move around the covers., but they're really dangerous if you clip one, and it'll have you off in a heartbreat
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 55, Bridgen Road, Bexley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 8th February
item.description:
Pls remove

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Evering Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Several potholes and exposed metalwork around the drain grate, eastbound side of Blendon Road, 8th February
item.description:
Several potholes and exposed metalwork around the drain grate, eastbound side of Blendon Road, in the vicinity of Arcadian and Elmwood. The potholes are pretty bad and VERY dangerous for cyclists. They may be unable to swerve as this bit of road is busy with the junctions, and traffic backing up from the Arbuthnot traffic lights.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Blendon Road, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Corner of Holly Walk and Churxh Row outside the cemetery and opposite the side of the church., 8th February
item.description:
The pavement has collapsed causing a hole which is full of broken pavement material, it’s almost on the kerb and at the place where pedestrians cross the road so very dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Holly Walk, West Hampstead, Greater London

item.title: 3 dogs pooing all over lawn, 8th February
item.description:
This man lets his dogs loose all over brook and house lawn and allows them to poo everywhere and never picks it up. I watch this every morning. The man just stands there watching and does nothing!! Disgusting please do something.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cresset Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Shredded tin cans a risk to animals, 8th February
item.description:
It appears an area has recently been cut beside a copper of trees using a machine. This hast resulteds in a number of tin cans being shredded and dispersed over a wide area. The shredded pieces are sharp and may cause injuries to dogs or children. The copse is on the north side of Danson lake,

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Danson Road, Blendon, Greater London

item.title: Rubbish by bins left for days, 8th February
item.description:
The street cleaners pick up rubbish & leave it in bags by the bins. These bags are not collected for days. The foxes rip them apart. Its worse than when you started. This area needs immediate cleaning. In future, collect the bags of rubbish on the day.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Primrose Square, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
